description: This file defines data models used in the 'shopease' application, including Product, User, CartItem, and Order classes, along with the OrderStatus enum. It utilizes Moshi annotations for JSON serialization.

classes.name: Product
classes.description: Represents a product with attributes such as id, title, description, price, image URL, rating, and stock status.

classes.name: User
classes.description: Represents a user with id, name, email, and optional contact information such as phone, address, and token.

classes.name: CartItem
classes.description: Represents an item in the shopping cart, associating a Product with a quantity.

classes.name: Order
classes.description: Represents a customer's order, including a list of CartItems, total amount, order status, and timestamp of placement.

classes.name: OrderStatus
classes.description: Enumeration of possible order statuses such as PLACED, CONFIRMED, SHIPPED, etc.
